definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
luggage that has been checked in (on flight)

sentences.english: Can I check this stroller at the gate?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在登机门托运婴儿推车吗？

sentences.english: Platform especially suitable for electric vehicles and electric vehicles and other small luggage checked machinery.
sentences.chinese: 特别适用于电动平台车和电动行李车等小型托运机械。

sentences.english: Service Contract must be with qualified shier.
sentences.chinese: 服务合同必须与合格的托运人签订。

sentences.english: She has checked all her luggages.
sentences.chinese: 她把所有的行李都托运了。

sentences.english: Less ? than Container is the mode which can be used to ship goods for more than one shippers and consignees.
sentences.chinese: 拼箱指可以为多个托运人和收货人托运货物的方式。

sentences.english: Less ? than Container is the mode which can be used to ship goods for more than one shippers and consignees.
sentences.chinese: 拼箱指可以为多个托运人和收货人托运货物的方式。

sentences.english: They checked in their luggage and found seats in the departure lounge.
sentences.chinese: 他们办完行李托运，到候机室找了座位坐下。

sentences.english: You may transport checked baggage up to a maximum weight of 32kg each item.
sentences.chinese: 您托运行李的单件重量不得超过32公斤。

sentences.english: How many luggages are you checking in?
Do you have any baggages to check?
Please fill in the luggage consignment notes and labels.
sentences.chinese: 请填写行李托运单和货签。

sentences.english: Nothing to worry about. The rail system has a luggage registration service.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，铁路系统提供行李托运服务。

sentences.english: Check it to my final  destination.
sentences.chinese: 把它托运到我的目的地。

sentences.english: The goods have been consigned  to you by railway.
sentences.chinese: 这些货物已交火车托运给你。

sentences.english: The last is the corresponding personnel signature, it can be checked.
sentences.chinese: 最后就是相应的人员开始签章，就可以进行了托运。

definition: luggage that has been checked in (on flight)
to change one's reservation/to transfer to a different flight, airline, bus or train
